title: Sin Miedo a La Verdad
overview: Manu is a cybernetic hero who has a Blog, which used anonymously under the pseudonym "Gus", with this anonymous identity, he protects all those who have been victims of some injustice. In each episode with his skills, he solves different cases related to various problems such as harassment, cyberbullying, sexting, corruption, impunity, organ trafficking, online drug dealing, suicide challenges, human trafficking, and theft of babies.
